remarks: Ring multiplication distributes over subtraction.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 19-Jun-2010.)
statement:
ringsubdi.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` R ) $.
ringsubdi.2 $e |- H = ( 2nd ` R ) $.
ringsubdi.3 $e |- X = ran G $.
ringsubdi.4 $e |- D = ( /g ` G ) $.
rngosubdir $p |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A D B ) H C ) = ( ( A H C ) D ( B H C ) ) ) $.
